name: Tapestry Patterns RPG Visual Novel
description:
This is an RPG Visual novel. Click around.  All answers lower case.yes/no questions = yes or no. If dialogues start kindly don't click again till the conversation ends or you might end up missing important information crucial to the game play. The main objective of the game is to appease the Guardian of the lake. This done through riddles and side quests. And lastly enjoy the game.
